frontmatter.title: The worst advice I got as a software engineer
frontmatter.description: Why 'code wins arguments' became the worst career advice I ever received as a software engineer. How focusing only on technical solutions while ignoring workplace dynamics led to my biggest professional mistake - and what I learned about the human side of engineering.
